page.title: 13My Community-Cramlington.
page.content: And there are a couple of community centres for old people.My community is Cramlington.Most houses are fairly modern,they were built in 1962.There are all constucted with reddish bricks, tiled roofs and a garden at the back and the front of the houses.Almost every house in the blocks has a garage that can vary in size. Every house has a kitchen, living room, bathroom and six bedrooms, and each house is centrally heated.People have extented their houses to personalize them adding double glazing, balconies etc. Cramlington is a New Town with a wide range of shops,leisure facilities and schools.The town centre is to the north of our survey area.The Nelson Industrial Estate provides much employment in the area.
